translation.en: All that needed to be said had been said.
translation.tam: Chenza at court. The court of silence.

translation.en: He asked that their conflict stop.
No matter what he did, the outcome would be the same.
The two sides put aside their differences and worked together towards a common goal.
translation.tam: Darmok. Darmok at Tanagra. Darmok and Jilad at Tanagra.

translation.en: The medicine immediately made him feel better.
Though she told him what would happen, he didn't listen.
Though they were tired, they continued working.
translation.tam: Zima at Anzo. Zima and Bakor.

translation.en: Though she didn't understand before, now she did.
The children sat in a circle to read the book together.
She asked if he wanted an apple.
The two sides were able to broker a deal that met both their needs.
In spite of their best intentions, the process did not function correctly.
He did not understand.
A wall appeared in their path.
The mouse trap sprung.
translation.tam: Uzani. His army. With fist closed.

translation.en: The injury she sustained hurt greatly.
translation.tam: Zinda! His face black. His eyes red.

translation.en: A piece of cheese was placed on the mouse trap to lure the mouse.
translation.tam: Uzani. His army at Lashmir. With fist open.

translation.en: They decided to try a new approach.
He refused her gift of the apple.
The journey would be demanding.
